messages.subject: Re: No SAT's?
messages.msgSnippet: The only one I know of off hand is the one I attended, Endicott in Beverly, MA. I know I ve heard of others,but I m not sure which one s they are. I m sure
messages.messageBody:
The only one I know of off hand is the one I attended, Endicott in Beverly,
MA. I know I've heard of others,but I'm not sure which one's they are. I'm
sure we'll be invastigating this more in the future, but we've still got 11
years until #1 goes to college. Also, keep in mind that many more colleges
are begining to see how great homeschooled kids do in college and are
accepting them more readily. Even Harvard has special admissions people set
up to handle homeschooled applicants (of course I'm sure they still require
SAT's <G>).
----- Original Message -----
From: <Strandbe@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 9:18 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] No SAT's?


> From: Strandbe@...
>
> <<Many colleges don't even require SAT's any more.>>
>
> You wouldn't happen to know of few of these, would you?
>
> Susan
